Dear Riford Family:
Pursuant to your FOIL request dated March 18, 2024, I have evaluated your request and due to
the level and extent of your request it will require extensive research and review of multiple
computer systems, including systems and files that are no longer active. As a result, | have
evaluated the time and effort required by staff to mine the information that you are requesting,
and it will take 38 hours at $31.64 per hour dedicated to producing the requested information.
‘We will begin to locate and compile the records upon receipt of $1,202.32.” Note that some of
the names listed on your FOIL request were duplicate names, as some last names changed due to
marriage or other legal name change.
Let me know if you have any questions. Lastly, the information that you have requested may
already be available by accessing all goverment employee salaries at SéeThroughNY. com.
